name: Playtime Photo Booth: Funny Faces Island
name_original: Playtime Photo Booth: Funny Faces Island
description:
Designed with kids in mind, Playtime Photo Booth is easy to use. It will bring smiles guaranteed to kids and kids at heart.

Take an adventure to Funny Faces Island. Visit Candy Cove or take a Safari Trip. Play with all the funny face effects, and fun stickers to create unique memories.
